2090940.name: Music Maker 2023 Premium Steam Edition
2090940.description:
Music made easy

Bring your music to the next level with high-quality sounds and effects in Music Maker 2023 Premium. Choose from thousands of sounds, loops and instruments to build completely new songs in no time. Easily produce fat beat patterns with 32 steps in just a few clicks using the brand-new Beatbox Pro 2 drum step sequencer. And add mixing magic to your tracks with the all-new wizardFX Suite, consisting of 11 pro effects.

Music Maker 2023 Premium Steam Edition

  • New! Beatbox Pro 2 – the intuitive drum machine
  • New! wizardFX Suite with 11 versatile effects
  • NEW! modernEQ 8-band equalizer for pro mixing
  • New! Improved interface & design
  • SongMaker AI
  • 3 Soundpools and 1 Soundpool Collection free unlimited audio tracks
  • 64-Bit & multicore support
  • Even more Soundpools, instruments & functions: The in-app Music Maker Store
  • Stay up-to-date: A lifetime of free updates
  • VST2 & VST3 support
2090940.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 芬兰语, 荷兰语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 瑞典语
